channel.title: Linus on Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Linus on Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog

item.title: Linux is Linux not Line-ux
item.description:
This is post is now quite old and the the information it contains may be out of date or innacurate.

If you find any errors or have any suggestions to update the information please let us know or create a pull request on GitHub

Line-us and Lin-us are both valid pronunciations of Linus, but there is only one way to pronounce Linux (Lin-ux not Line-ux).
